channel.title: Advances in Medical Technology and Parallels to Healing Potions and Magical Cures on The Hogwarts Hoaxes
channel.description: Recent content in Advances in Medical Technology and Parallels to Healing Potions and Magical Cures on The Hogwarts Hoaxes

item.title: Muggle Medics: Are They Finally Catching Up? Alarming Progress in Non-Magical Healing.
item.description: In what can only be described as a development that has the Ministry of Magic’s Department of International Magical Cooperation scratching their heads, Muggles appear to be making significant strides in their so-called ‘medical technology.’ Whispers from Obliviators assigned to Muggle hospitals (mostly to clean up after overzealous Healers use too much Skelegro on unsuspecting patients, honestly) suggest these non-magical folk are developing methods to address ailments that, until recently, were exclusively the domain of potions and charms.
